texts.Description:Abp.Identity.User.SmsNewUser: When the user registers, he/she should send the template number of the SMS verification code and fill in the template number of the corresponding cloud platform registration
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.User.SmsUserSig: When the user logs in, he/she should send the template number of the SMS verification code and fill in the template number of the corresponding cloud platform registration
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.User.SmsResetPa: When the user resets the password, he/she sends the template number of SMS verification code and fills in the template number registered on the cloud platform
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.User.SmsPhoneNu: The user confirms the mobile phone verification code template
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.User.SmsRepetIn: The valid time for the user to send SMS verification code, unit m, default 3min
texts.SendRepeatSmsVerifyCode: Phone verification code cannot be sent repeatedly within {0} minutes!
